attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: i am a righty. and when i downloaded this game my TOASTER exploded i spent $200 on that toaster and this app BROKE IT. i love donald trump but am disappointed in this app 😪 #trump❤️🇺🇸

attributes.title: Horrible 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🧚‍♂️🧚🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash and also Donald trump broke into my house and said that my dog looked like my grandma

attributes.title: Complete Garbage.
attributes.review: I wish I could give zero or negative stars. This needs to be removed from the App Store IMMEDIATELY.

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it and opened it and saw trumps I had to give 1 star. He looks like he is crying 😔

attributes.title: I hate Trump
attributes.review: Trump is stupid and I hate him so I hope someone kills him. He’s sexist, a rapist, racist, queer phobic, xenophobic, a sex trafficker, and a biggot. If you support him then I’ll see you in hell.

attributes.title: Data Haul!
attributes.review: This app collects a massive amount of data about all users which is then reused by the campaign.

attributes.title: No thank you
attributes.review: Crashed my phone and the country.

attributes.title: Gave us a Virus
attributes.review: This app gave me a horrible virus. My whole family got it and we love Trump. Heil Trump. It’s sad to see such an app go down the drain.

attributes.title: This app doesn’t need to exist
attributes.review: Just a waste of space on your phone.

attributes.title: Didn’t make America Great Again
attributes.review: Just made my iPad implod with glitches. Wouldn’t not recommend!!,,,,,
